nodes.text: Satellite Nine was a satellite in the galaxy. An Ithorian was supposedly held as "the most admired and handsome" Ithorian in the orbit of Satellite Nine.

Satellite Nine was first mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical. It was later made canonical with the publishing of Musings of an Ithorian on Hyperspace.
